description:
This is a new epub reader application made using the new tauri framework. Tauri based applications have lower memory footprint and better performance compared to the electron based applications.

Since alexandria is a new application the feature set is minimal and limited for now. It's also not as polished as some minor bugs can be encountered from time to time. Though it gets the job done for most of the normal use cases.
summary: A decent epub reader. Works on wayland. Gets the job done

description: all other e-book app crashing and refuse to open my ebook but this one woork smoothly would recommend it anyday !! thankss !
